headline: Does Hartford (HIG) Offer Upside After Strong Multi‑Year Share Price Performance
summary: If you are wondering whether Hartford Insurance Group's current share price lines up with its underlying value, you are not alone. This article will walk through what the market might be pricing in. The stock last closed at US$141.89, with returns of 7.6% over 30 days, 3.5% year to date, 28.5% over 1 year, 94.1% over 3 years and 218.4% over 5 years, alongside a 0.3% decline over the past week. Recent news around Hartford Insurance Group has focused on its position within the broader...

headline: Are Wall Street Analysts Bullish on Hartford Insurance Stock?
summary: Hartford Insurance has outperformed the broader market over the past year, and analysts remain moderately positive on the stock’s outlook.
